original_text: ‘Come and see a man who has told me everything about myself. He told me all the things that I have ever done! He must be the Messiah!’
korean_text: 내가 행한 모든 일을 내게 말한 사람을 와서 보라 이는 그리스도가 아니냐 하니

sentences.original_text: who has told me everything about myself
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 나에 대한 모든 것을 말해주었습니다

sentences.original_text: He told me all the things
